changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.entity_network_deduction ( id bigserial NOT NULL, deduction bigint NOT NULL, premise1 bigint NOT NULL, premise2 bigint NOT NULL, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp without time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, CONSTRAINT entity_network_deduction_path_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT entity_network_deduction_path_hypothesis_fkey FOREIGN KEY (deduction) REFERENCES ruleform.entity_network (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT entity_network_deduction_path_premise1_fkey FOREIGN KEY (premise1) REFERENCES ruleform.entity_network (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT entity_network_deduction_path_premise2_fkey FOREIGN KEY (premise2) REFERENCES ruleform.entity_network (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT entity_network_deduction_path_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT entity_network_deduction_path_u UNIQUE (deduction , premise1 , premise2 ) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE );
